title:
VR4UrbanDev: An Immersive Virtual Reality Experience for Energy Data
  Visualization
authors:
Saeed Safikhani, Georg Arbesser-Rastburg, Anna Schreuer, J\"urgen
  Suschek-Berger, Hermann Edtmayer and Johanna Pirker
abstract:
In this demonstration paper, we present our interactive virtual reality (VR)
experience, which has been designed to facilitate interaction with
energy-related information. This experience consists of two main modes: the
world in miniature for large-scale and first-person for real-world scale
visualizations. Additionally, we presented our approach to potential target
groups in interviews. The results of these interviews can help developers for
future implementation considering the requirements of each group.
